I almost sent it back the first day because of it, but after giving it a test run, I love the pictures it takes waay too much.  Its kinda like a great car which has a dinky horn.I'm not a master photographer, but for an average family this is taking fantastic pictures.  You could spend a lot more on a family camera, but this model will perform just as well I think.  And the touch screen is super fun. Highly recommend!!

Reviews.Title: gift
Reviews.Author: Kristina Beckett "teach"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera as a Christmas gift and it was well recieved. My sister is extremely happy with having her own camera.

Reviews.Title: great camera!
Reviews.Author: Stephc
Reviews.Content: from the pictures online i thought it would be big but its really small and compact i love it and the design is awesome! first time using a touch screen though so lets see other than that the picture quality is really sharp and clear! love it.

Reviews.Author: David Gabrielyan
Reviews.Content: I'm very glad of my purchase .. thanks a lot ! i will buy another one for my friend in a couple weeks !!

Reviews.Title: Really like the camera!
Reviews.Author: Amy Nguyen "-amy-"
Reviews.Content: Got this camera for my Christmas gift because my old one broke and I really need a camera for work and personal use! First time using it was tricky but after figuring things out I LOVE it! Work great for everything I use plus taking micro pictures for work! Love the color and and style of the camera as well! The only thing I might not like us the touch screen but I can get use to it if I keep using it! I'm always satisfied with a Canon camera! =)

Reviews.Title: It's a good camera. So practical.
Reviews.Author: Anavir Padilla
Reviews.Content: I choose this product because is a good camera and I recomend it for home use and ladies. I like the touch fuctions.

Reviews.Title: Cool
Reviews.Author: MD Mozahidur Rahman
Reviews.Content: Yeppi, got it, its amazing.. in fact I dint expect this much in this amount.... and thanks for the styles ... love it..

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: C. Stewart
Reviews.Content: This little gem takes nice clear photos and is very compact. It also takes nice video. I'm enjoying it and recommend it to anyone who just wants an easy way to take a nice picture.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera
Reviews.Author: Pierre Decembre
Reviews.Content: my favorite feature is the touchscreen, it shoots very well in low light condition, and video recording is simply amazing

Reviews.Title: just what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Aaron Fulton
Reviews.Content: like it does just what I want easy to use handy just put in your pocket it's with you all the time

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Peter Konnoff
Reviews.Content: We all used this camera and were very happy with the quality of the pictures and the motion pictures we took.  This camera is simple and user friendly.

Reviews.Title: OK Camera, but could be better
Reviews.Author: N. Tazeh "Sidney Tazeh"
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is not that great: over exposed sometimesCharging is a pain as you have to remove the battery ans stick it into a charger every timeWon't be returning it but would probably not buy it again if I had to do it all over again

Reviews.Title: I love this camera!
Reviews.Author: TheAwesomeMachine
Reviews.Content: So I got this camera a couple of days ago and I love it. It takes great video and pictures, obviously not super amazing fantastic quality, but for a camera this cheap, it's really great. The design is nice and I love it. I highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot A3400 IS
Reviews.Author: Steve G
Reviews.Content: The Canon A3400 camera is an improvement over older Canon point & shoot I have had for 4 years. Pictures tend to be slightly clearer but the refresh rate (ability to shoot next picture in quick succession) is still less than I had hoped for. the IS capability is a good addition to this camera and expect to see a greater number clear pictures than I would have from older canon product.

Reviews.Title: Not up to Canon quality for pictures.
Reviews.Author: Stuart R Vrieze
Reviews.Content: Got from Amazon through Beach Camera. The case received was not the Canon one shown, but instead a Beach Camera belt case that is twice the size of the camera. Not worth returning since I bought is on sale for a Christmas gift, but I will be getting a different case. I feel ripped off on the bundle deal. Better off getting the case you want separately. Also, the memory card was not the one shown online for the bundle deal. The camera seems lie a nice little camera, but poor picture quality for a Canon. I expected better. It is a first camera for my preteen daughter, and she will be happy nonetheless.

Reviews.Title: Highly Recommended for Gamers.
Reviews.Author: Robson Calverley
Reviews.Content: This Compact Digital Camera is good for both Gaming and Vlog video's. It Records in 720p 25 Frames per Second and it has high quality stereo sound Linear PCM 2 Channel and it has a Wide Angle Lens. Overall this Camera is really good and a must have.

Reviews.Title: Confusing.
Reviews.Author: D. W. Bigelow
Reviews.Content: This is the third Canon PowerShot camera that I have owned.  I found this camera more confusing and difficult to operate than the first two cameras.  Also, after having had this camera since Dec. 4th, today, Dec. 21st, I received a notice advising me that this camera is being shipped!

Reviews.Title: Canon Power Shot A3400 IS 16.0 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: L. Iavagnilio
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera because I was tired of paying for film, expensive batterie's and processing. We have several weddings coming up and the 1st wedding with this camera gave us beautiful pictures and video's. I love it!  Iavagnilio

Reviews.Title: Love the camera
Reviews.Author: Anya
Reviews.Content: Love this camera.  Bought it as an extra to use in my classroom to take quick pics of my students for classroom use. Handles the awful school fluorescent lighting with ease.  Also enjoy using it as an "easy tote" camera for those just in case shots.  Only wish that it took batteries -- I forgot my charger on a trip and lost a lot of potential shots when the battery died. My son had a similar Canon, but his charger was not compatible with mine.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for I guess
Reviews.Author: J. Allen
Reviews.Content: Bought this prior to a disney world trip.  I was replacing a 9 year old Sony DSC-V1 that has gotten pretty ragged over the years.Pros:- battery life has been very good in my experience- good zoom- one touch video recording- pictures are goodcons:- when recording video if the focal length changes you hear a 1-2 second buzzing sound in the video while the focus adjusts.  basically makes the video unwatchable for those 1-2 seconds.- shutter delay is longer than most cameras.  easy to miss pictures if you are taking pictures that aren't posed.- the auto flash can be inconsistent which can lead to blurry pictures at night.- touchscreen is not really that useful.overall I wasn't sure what to expect since I had never owned a point and shoot before.  The DSC-V1 I was used to was a little more on the higher end side than this camera and so it has more features.  I was looking forward to a camera that I could whip out, take some quick snaps and put back in my pocket.  However, I found the picture taking to be less easy than I was hoping for.  Pressing the button to take pictures would sometimes quickly take a picture and sometimes not.  Sometimes the autoflash would fire and sometimes not.At Disney World we were often giving the camera to Disney photogs to take our picture and many of those shots ended up being blurry and unuseable.  I was hoping this point and shoot would be more automatic than it is.Maybe my impression of it will improve as I use it more and figure out the tricks.  For now I probably wouldn't buy this one again.

Reviews.Title: not what I expected
Reviews.Author: Christine N. Vu
Reviews.Content: I was reading the review before purchase it. However, when I received I was disappointed.  the color is not sharp. I'm not happy with it.  I would not recommand anybody to buy it.

Reviews.Title: Cannon Has Another Winner!!!
Reviews.Author: Charlie Winner
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife and she is thrilled with the features.  She had another Cannon, but this one had more of the advancements shutter bugs desire.  She bought a bigger thing, with more gig and she has been using without fail.  Norman Camera fulfilled this order - fast service and timely notification.

Reviews.Title: Beware!
Reviews.Author: Camguy
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera thinking it would do a decent job when you want to carry a small camera around and take photos.  The photo quality is okay for the price but shortly before 3 months were up the camera lens stuck open.  Fortunately it was still under warranty and I'm getting it fixed.  Of course I had to pay shipping costs to a repair center.  I would not recommend this camera when it malfunctions like this all of a sudden.  Evidently this is a common occurence.

Reviews.Title: Suggestion for a compatible camera case
Reviews.Author: Kimberly J. Karas "a New England mom"
Reviews.Content: I have not had much time to use the camera as yet so I will likely be back to update my review.  In the meanwhile I wanted to say that so far it's working great.  Picture quality and ease of use are both five star.  I wanted to suggest a simple camera case that fits this camera since I scoured the product listings to get something inexpensive that would fit right.  What I bought (again here on amazon) was the Case Logic Medium Case UMZ-3.  It comes in pink/gray or blue/gray and has a screen protector.  I thought that would be helpful information off the bat that I could offer until I am able to do a more detailed review of the camera itself.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the Price
Reviews.Author: Jen
Reviews.Content: I didn't want to drag my SLR around Disney World. I needed a small camera that took decent pictures. This fit the bill. All of the outdoor pictures were great. The indoor pictures left a little to be desired, but it was to be expected. Overall, I was very happy.

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly Disappointing
Reviews.Author: Paul Binder
Reviews.Content: Picture quality was very disappointing. Tried different modes and settings, but, same results. Images were blurry in some areas and colors seemed washed out and dull, even with an upgraded SD card too! I took out my 7 year old Kodak camera and took the same pics, and they turned out fine. Maybe I didn't work with the settings enough, or maybe I received a lemon, but it was very disappointing. It seems odd because this camera is 3x more powerful than my old Kodak. I ended up returning it. Canon is a great company, but, this camera's pictures were not good at all.

Reviews.Title: great price!
Reviews.Author: Yer
Reviews.Content: Great price for this camera. It does a great job but One day I would like to upgrade to a better camera, one that can take movement shots. Love how I have the option to touch the screen or not. Very easy and light and small.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Charli Clark
Reviews.Content: This camera I bought because it was on Sale at the time! Its almost better than my big DSLR camera.

Reviews.Title: Love the camera a whole lot....love it..love it..
Reviews.Author: Domita Calvin
Reviews.Content: I love the camera a whole lot, I just wish I can use it.  I need to know how to use the correct buttons.

Reviews.Title: LOVEmyPICSgottaLOVEtheCAMERA
Reviews.Author: Tiffanie Veitengruber
Reviews.Content: I am a person that loves to take good quality photos this camera was very small for me to hold and wasn't as a easy use as i thought it would be. This is a very good camera for someone that only wants to use it once in a while. I will say that once you get the hang how it takes pictures the quality is really good.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Chhannennathy
Reviews.Content: I felt as if I was mislead by the fact that I found out i had to buy memory card in order to use it but hey, nice camera. screen is smaller than I thought it would be.

Reviews.Title: Good entry level Canon camera
Reviews.Author: FilmPro
Reviews.Content: I am slightly biased regarding image quality as I mainly use a Canon 5D and 7D, but I also have a need for a easy to carry around camera that beats the iPhone 4S camera. This Canon has a rechargeable battery unlike so many other compact point and shoots and it's small enough to carry in my pocket without being annoying. The image quality is good for general traveling, people that you don't care so much about, and craigslist. But for work, eBay selling, or my own children I would definitely use something like the 5D with an interchangeable lens.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed
Reviews.Author: Dhandy
Reviews.Content: The camera is awful. I expected Canon to deliver a great product because I am using Canon products and big Canon fan. The quality of image has disappointed me and the video is worse! Did not expect this from Canon.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Jen
Reviews.Content: The Amazon bundle was a good value. The camera, case, and memory were cost-effective. The camera seems fine considering the price range.

Reviews.Title: Horrible camera, DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: edward
Reviews.Content: Do not buy this camera! It has given me nothing but aggravation from day one. Do yourself a favor and spare yourself all that aggravation.Honestly, this is the first review I've ever written. I'm not the type to write reviews, but I feel  a responsibility to tell other buyers what I wish I knew before I purchased this piece of junk, in order to spare other people the disappointment I suffered following this most unfortunate purchase. I have a very busy schedule and limited online access so I would only write a review if I'm REALLY riled up, which I am.Right away when I bought it, I saw that the camera was not a good camera and wanted to exchange it for a better model. I didn't feel like spending all that money for a mediocre camera. So within 30 days of purchase and with the original receipt I went down to the retail store I bought it from and they refused to take it back. I called Canon directly and they also refused to exchange it for me because I didn't buy it from them directly.I bought it to replace an almost 7 year old Canon SD400 which was still working but going bad (it was 7 years old after all). I was happy with that camera but towards the end of its life the pictures were really blurry. So I decided to invest in a good camera that would last. I just needed a decent camera that would take good pictures when I needed them. I barely use my camera but I just want to have one for when I need it. I wasn't looking for professional grade or fancy features. Just a good decent camera that would take good pictures and last. I had good faith in Canon at that point. So I was only looking to buy a Canon since it's supposed to be a good company. What can I tell you, I was extremely disappointed; this is not what I expected from Canon.I have to admit, it is a nice looking camera (I have the silver) and I liked the size. But the picture quality is TERRIBLE. Takes awful, blurry pictures. (I noticed now that many other reviewers had the same issue, so this is not an isolated case). I did not invest in a new camera to get a disappointment like this. And the touchscreen is not even so great. In fact, I didn't realize it had touch screen till someone pointed it out to me.After everyone refused to exchange it for me I was terribly disappointed and felt ripped off, but after the initial disappointment was able to live with it (though still very unhappy with the camera). But after just a few uses the camera malfunctioned and simply REFUSED TO START.  Got it to work again, but this happened a few times and now is just not starting no matter what. And the camera is still brand new with only a handful of uses. (Just to give you an I idea of how often I use my camera: I own one memory card that has less than 1 gig of memory. That memory card has 4 years worth of pictures on it- and still has available space!)All in all, I was terribly disappointed in the quality of this camera and feel I paid lots of money ($129.99 on sale, $179.99 original price) for a piece of junk. Main issue was picture quality, and then malfunctioned after a few uses. So do yourself a favor and steer clear of this camera.

Reviews.Title: Blurry pictures, total trash
Reviews.Author: Golib Holjigitov "student"
Reviews.Content: Blurry pictures, total trash! Do not ever buy it, i was fan of Canon, but no more. I am switching to 200 dollar models of Sony.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Michael Mankus
Reviews.Content: V e r y  g o o d, h a p p y w i t h e v e r y t h i n g.

Reviews.Title: NO MEMORY CARD !!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Dale C
Reviews.Content: This Christmas present was nice in the box but not functional.  No memory card means no pictures, please add a warning that the camera will not work has packaged.  This is like buying a car with no oil in the engine.  Tomorrow I will know if the camera works.

Reviews.Title: Problem
Reviews.Author: No Name!!
Reviews.Content: This Camera arrived without a memory card!!  Very disappointing!!  Therefore, it caused a delay before it could be used!!!  Had to get a memory card before it could be used by my grandson!!  A sad disappointment!!

Reviews.Title: It is broken down in the first month - But the company sent unbroken one
Reviews.Author: onur
Reviews.Content: I bought one as a present to my father in Turkey,its lens is not closing now, the camera is not working because of this.I took it to Canon service in Turkey, they are saying that guarantie is not working in Turkey and want $120 to fix it.Canon is putting a defected item in market, and its service wants money for fixing it. Why do I have to pay fixing a camera that Canon could not manage to produce correctly?Do not buy this product if you do not want to get into trouble.I have sent the item back to States and  they changed it with new refurbished one. I think this will work well.

Reviews.Title: don't buy it.
Reviews.Author: Jin Lei
Reviews.Content: just don't waste your money on this piece of s***...my 2008 nokia can take a better picture than this. DO NOT BUY IT!

Reviews.Title: No memory . REALLY?
Reviews.Author: mcbeachbum
Reviews.Content: I got this as a Christmas present and I wanted to use it on Christmas , but the camera has no internal memory and comes with no memory card! I can't tell you anything about it yet because...I CAN"T USE IT!

Reviews.Title: Viewfinder Would be Helpful
Reviews.Author: dg
Reviews.Content: This camera is solid except for the fact there is no viewfinder.  Therefore, if you're shooting on a sunny day and can't see the screen, you have no idea what you're shooting, nor do you what the settings are set to.  This is very poor design in my opinion.
